bio: I am a blockchain user interested in blockchain technology and its potential to revolutionize various industries.
contributionDescription: Investing in cryptocurrencies and Using decentralized applications and hopefully it can invite other people to be interested in the world of blockchain, especially in the op network and don't forget to remind people who are unfamiliar with the world of blockchain or crypto.
impactDescription:
I often use OP network for various projects as a user.
where Blockchain users come from all walks of life and from all over the world. They are united by their passion for blockchain technology and its potential to create a more secure, transparent and efficient world.

fundingSources.description: I am also a community base who is studying blockchain performance.

pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for violating the Grant program rule 10. The applicant's contribution to the Web3/blockchain space is just using the technology and not specifically working on any projects that have a clear relationship to Optimism.
